questions.title: 桌子上有一个西瓜和一些橘子。
questions.answer: There is a watermelon and some oranges on the table.

questions.title: 我市下周将有一场大型的篮球比赛。
questions.answer: There is going to be a large basketball match in our city next week.

questions.title: 昨晚香港有一场王菲的演唱会。
questions.answer: There was a Faye Wong concert in Hong Kong last night.

questions.title: 汤姆家的墙上有一幅梵高的画。
questions.answer: There is a painting by Van Gogh on the wall in Tom's home.

questions.title: 碟子里有一些土豆片。
questions.answer: There are some potato chips in the dish.

questions.title: 下周五我们学校将会有一场足球比赛。
questions.answer: There will be a football game in our school next Friday.

title: ——妈妈，我饿了！有什么吃的吗？
——第一层橱柜里有一盒饼干和一块巧克力。

answer.en: ——Mom, I'm hungry！Is there something to eat?
——There is a box of biscuits and a bar of chocolate in the first cupboard.

title: ——你的衣帽间里有什么？
——有一百双高跟鞋和一千多件衣服。
——你真富有。

answer.en: ——There are one hundred pairs of high-heel shoes and more than one thousand clothes in it.

title: ——这儿已经有几个月不下雨了。
——太可怕了，这个地区的庄稼长得不好。

answer.en: ——There has been no rain for several months.
——It is terrible. The crop does not grow well in this area.
